snippet: Philip Nelson transferred to the Scarlet Knights from Minnesota after the 2013 season, but was dismissed from the team after he was arrested over the weekend in connection with an assault.
abstract: Rutgers football team dismisses quarterback Philip Nelson following his arrest in connection with an assault on Isaac Kolstad, former fellow linebacker, outside a bar in Mankato, Minn; Kolstad remains in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: Philip Nelson transferred to the Scarlet Knights from Minnesota after the 2013 season, but was dismissed from the team after he was arrested over the weekend in connection with an assault.

headline.main: Rutgers Cuts Quarterback Charged in Minnesota Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Dismisses Quarterback Charged in a Beating Outside a Minnesota Bar

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
